response.overview: The story is set on a highway which leads to Vizag. A serial killer starts creating havoc in this route and kills several people. On the other hand, Poturaju(Sai Ram) is a lorry driver who wants to marry a lady constable(Nikisha Patel) and keeps wooing her.  The twist in the tale arises when Poturaju accidentally meets the serial killer on the highway and starts traveling with him. What happens during the journey ? Will the serial killer finish Poturaju too ?
response.title: Araku Road Lo – Bumpy Ride
